comments.body: can we also check if the security.protocol is sasl or sasl_ssl and only enable this for the sasl handshake. Instead of asking users to disable this if they are using SSL?

Hi,

This has been suggested previously and was part of the initial implementation (see https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/4485/commits/24757eb7b06bcf8c7d7649c85232c52b5d54f0e4)

You can potentially use SASL_SSL and still enable this feature.
This has been discussed on the email thread (see replies https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/ec3b6826f876382690214cdcad3ab9adc8f0986b34feb799c9810f22@%3Cdev.kafka.apache.org%3E)

I think the view is that this feature shouldn't take the security protocol into account.
